idea-plugin.name: RoboPOJOGenerator
idea-plugin.description: Intellij Idea and Android Studio plugin for JSON to POJO transformation. Generates Java, Java Records and Kotlin POJO files from JSON: GSON, FastJSON, AutoValue (GSON), Logan Square, Jackson, Lombok, Jakarta JSON Binding, empty annotations' template. Supports: primitive types, multiple inner JSONArrays. Keywords: JsonToPojo, Json2Pojo, Kotlin, GSON, FastJSON, AutoValue, Jackson, LoganSquare, Moshi, Parcelable, Lombok, Jakarta JSON Binding, Java records.
